title.rendered: The peculiarity of the Qatar 2022 World Cup draw and the recommendations for Argentines

content.rendered:
It is essential to dress completely in black to attend the ceremony that will take place on April 1 in Doha. The simulation showed an easy group and another “death” for the Argentine National Team.

  • Qatar 2022 World Cup draw: all the details

Increase tension. The prelude to Qatar 2022 World Cup draw enters its final stretch. The eyes of the football world will be on Dohathe April 1stdate on which each qualified team will meet their three rivals in order to achieve eternal glory.

For Argentines, those fans of “La Scaloneta”, the appointment will start at 13 with Lionel Scalloni, Claudio Tapia Y Sergio Aguero to the head, although with some details to take into account.

Mariano Hoffmann He is Argentine, he is part of the Organizing Committee of the World Cup and from Dohagave details to TyC Sports of the tournament simulation which was done yesterday. “I was the one who took out the balls with the letters for the groups, more than anything for the televising process“, he explained.

They simulated the draw for the Qatar 2022 World Cup: Easy group or “death” for the Argentine National Team?


“There were two random draws (“random” in English). In one, the Argentine National Team had an easy group and the other was the one of death with Denmark. The same is all to try, nothing fixed, only for step by step process“, he added.

The particularity of the draw for the Qatar 2022 World Cup: “All in black”

“They asked me, it is a theme of events for the theme of television. They want everything to be black so nothing stands out. Not even the white stockings because everything is on TV“, detailed Hoffmann.

Recommendations for Argentines traveling to the 2022 Qatar World Cup

qatar will house at least 32 countries at the same time if you take into account the selections classified at the world. everyone will be concentrated in a radius of 130 kilometers and one of the issues of concern is that of accommodation. One thing to keep in mind is that 10 percent (local citizens) of the total population of the country (2,500,000 inhabitants) do not pay taxes.

Recommendations for Argentines traveling to the 2022 Qatar World Cup


“There is room for everyone, they are enabling little by little. Around the furthest stadiums around there will be cities, not neighborhoods. All of that is under construction. The little that remains to be finished is the accommodation issue, which is being enabled in stages. The first thing they enabled was the 5-star hotels. The most popular is to stay with local families, there will be options, you have to have a little patience“, warning Hoffmann.

As for everything that has to do with logistics on match days, the member of the Organizing Committee of the World Cup was more than clear: “Let the Argentines forget about the car because of the chaos that will take place in the World Cup and because of how people drive. The metro is the best option because you arrive directly, and if there is no direct trip, they will have a round trip bus, both day and night.“.
